Package org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.pgroup

Class FormGroupStrategy

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.pgroup.AbstractGroupStrategy
org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.pgroup.FormGroupStrategy
public class FormGroupStrategy
extends AbstractGroupStrategy
FormGroupStrategy makes a PGroup mimic the look and feel of an Eclipse Form Section.
Since:
1.0
